name: microfrontend-create
description: This is a microfrontend project builder through webpack v5 (ModuleFederationPlugin). You can create a 'container' or 'child' microfrontend. You will also be able to decide under which development environment to work, be it 'React', 'Vue', 'Angular', 'Svelte' , 'Vanillajs', 'Vanillawc' (web-components) or 'Lit'
author: Gast√≥n Maximiliano Grecco <gastonmgrecco@gmail.com>
